titleStmt.title: A declaration by the Lords and Commons in Parliament declaring that none shall aprehend, or arest any of his maiesties subjects or servants that obeyeth the ordinance of Parliament, under pretence of his Maiesties warrant[.] Mercurii 12. July 1642

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated and signed: July 13. 1642 Jo. Browne Cleric. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
